column6: "ORIGINS AND ENDINGS" Part 5 (of 5)  Since regaining his memory, Wolverine has been methodically stalking toward a mysterious objective-his first priority on a very long list. Now, finally, he has achieved that objective.  With Wolverine out in the world, running his own program, the international community has been justifiably nervous.  Now, they're terrified.  And they have every reason to be.
column8: | penciller (cover):Kaare Andrews | letterer:Randy Gentile | penciller:Javier Saltares | colorist:J. D. Smith | inker:Mark Texeira | writer:Daniel Way
